room_title: Escape room "Superheroes Adventure" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: We took four kids and three adults to do the Superhero room and really enjoyed it. The guys running it were amazingly nice and helpful, and while we didn't breakout, it was definitely doable. The puzzles were difficult, but rational and well conceived. Thanks for a lovely afternoon!

room_title: Escape room "Superheroes Adventure" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: We did the Superhero room, and it was fun for 3 generations! Terrence was an excellent moderator who expertly guided us through our caped adventure.

room_title: Escape room "Superheroes Adventure" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: We did the Superheroes and were so close to finishing it! We will be back to do another one for sure! It was way more fun than i thought it would be as i am not a puzzle fan but our daughter has been begging to do one.

room_title: Escape room "Superheroes Adventure" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: We had such a fun time in the Superhero room! It was a little disappointing to hear when we got there that the room we signed up for only had like a 15% success rate. It was definitely very challenging. The electronic safe failed, costing us several minutes while we waited for staff to come with a key. The puzzles were interesting but we still don't know where on earth all the clues are in that room! We did not break out.

room_title: Escape room "Superheroes Adventure" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: This is great fun with family. The superhero room was hard but fun.
